description: When you set an image as your iOS wallpaper or lock screen, the operating system creates a copy of that image and converts it to the CPBITMAP format. This allows iOS to load the image more efficiently at startup and whenever you view your home or lock screen.

common_filenames.description: HomeBackground.cpbitmap - The name iOS assigns to your wallpaper image.
LockBackground.cpbitmap - The name iOS assigns to your lock screen image.
